Row.Text: Newly founded [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns in Distant Lands start with this [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion in place.
+2 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Missionaries when Embarked. +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for all Naval and Embarked Units.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Military Units in friendly Settlements that follow this [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
Conquered Settlements are converted to your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
When a [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route is established to a Settlement, it is converted to your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training [icon:UNIT_MISSIONARY] Missionaries for every [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic Slot in Temples in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
Gain 2 [icon:UNIT_MISSIONARY] Missionaries when you build a [icon:WONDER] Wonder. This belief can be chosen by multiple Civilizations.
+1 [icon:WAR_SUPPORT] War Support against Civilizations who have founded a [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic Slot in [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
Treasure Convoys gain +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement and +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when defending.
+2 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relics for first-time conversion of a [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State.
+2 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relics for first-time conversion of another Civilization’s [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital city.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic for first-time conversion of another Civilization’s Settlement with a Temple or Altar.
+2 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relics for first-time conversion of another Civilization's Settlement with a [icon:WONDER] Wonder from any Age.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic for first-time conversion of another Civilization's Settlement in Distant Lands that is not a City-State.
+2 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relics for first-time conversion of another Civilization's Settlement producing [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoys.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic for the first time conversion of another Civilization's Settlement with at least 10 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Rural Population.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic for the first time conversion of another Civilization's Settlement with at least 10 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Urban Population.
+2 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relics for the first-time Conversion of a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Holy City. This belief can be chosen by multiple Civilizations.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic for first-time Conversion of one of your [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+2 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relics for first-time Conversion of a Settlement with at least 3 [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.
+2 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relics for first-time Conversion of any Settlement with a [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_NATURAL_WONDER] Natural Wonder.

+4 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every foreign Settlement following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for each of your own Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.

+8 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold, and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every tile that has a [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_NATURAL_WONDER] Natural Wonder in other Civilizations’ Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.

+4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold, and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every [icon:WONDER] Wonder in other Civilizations’ Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.

+4 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every foreign Settlement following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each of your own Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.

+4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every foreign Settlement following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for each of your own Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every Tropical tile in other Civilizations’ Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Tundra tile in other Civilizations’ Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every Desert tile in other Civilizations’ Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.

+4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for every foreign Settlement following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for each of your own Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for every Marine tile in other Civilizations’ Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every Grassland tile in other Civilizations’ Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Plains tile in other Civilizations’ Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.

+3 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science, [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness, [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence, and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on the Temple in your Holy City. If you retain this belief, this bonus transfers to your Palace in Modern. This belief can be chosen by multiple Civilizations.

+2 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every foreign Settlement following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for each of your Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every Navigable River tile in foreign Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+6 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in your Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+4 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in your Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
All [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings receive a +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness adjacency with the Temple.
Have the [B]Shrines of the Kami [/B] Belief
